outputs.output_descr: Universal access to HIV prevention, treatment, care and support services for people living with HIV as well as general population with specific focus on most vulnerable populations, youth and women ensured

project_descr: Continuing scale up of the response to HIV with particular focus on Most-at-Risk Population and strengthening system and capacity for universal access to HIV prevention, diagnosis, treatment and care in Uzbekistan
project_title: Scale up of the response to HIV
